languages.text: "Однако {mf|он|она} не только не очистил{mf||а} мир от ереси, но и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}позволила ксеносам встать во главе колонии{/d}! Миллионы людских жизней оказались запятнаны ксеноскверной, и даже Торговый Патент Вольного Торговца не в силах оправдать подобное преступление против Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Однако {mf|он|она} не только не очистил{mf||а} мир от ереси, но и позволила ксеносам встать во главе колонии! Миллионы людских жизней оказались запятнаны ксеноскверной, и даже Торговый Патент Вольного Торговца не в силах оправдать подобное преступление против Человечества".

languages.text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Однако {mf|он|она} не только не очистил{mf||а} мир от ереси, но и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}позволила ксеносам встать во главе колонии{/d}! Миллионы людских жизней оказались запятнаны ксеноскверной, и даже Торговый Патент Вольного Торговца не в силах оправдать подобное преступление против Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging the heresy from the planet, {mf|he|she} let the xenos take charge of the entire colony! Millions of human lives were stained by the xeno-corruption, not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

"Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging the heresy from the planet, {mf|he|she} let the xenos take charge of the entire colony! Millions of human lives were stained by the xeno-corruption, not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

"Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging the heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} let the xenos take charge of the entire colony! Millions of human lives were stained by the xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

"Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging the heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} let the xenos take charge of the entire colony! Millions of human lives were stained by the xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

"Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} let the xenos take charge of the entire colony! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

"Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

languages.text: « Mais {mf|il|elle} ne s'est pas {mf|contenté|contentée} de purger l'hérésie de la planète, {mf|il|elle} a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}laissé les xénos prendre le contrôle de la colonie tout entière{/d} ! Des millions de vies humaines ont été entachées par la xénocorruption. Même la lettre de marque ne peut justifier un tel crime contre l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Mais {mf|il|elle} ne s'est pas {mf|contenté|contentée} de purger l'hérésie de la planète, {mf|il|elle} a laissé les xénos prendre le contrôle de la colonie tout entière ! Des millions de vies humaines ont été entachées par la xénocorruption. Même la lettre de marque ne peut justifier un tel crime contre l'humanité. »

languages.text: “然而，{mf|他|她}却并没有将那些异形从加努斯清除出去，而是{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}让那群异形接管了整座殖民地{/d}！数百万人类的生命遭到了腐化的玷污。即便是贸易授状，也无法为这样的反人类罪行开脱。”
languages.original_text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “然而，{mf|他|她}却并没有将那些异形从加努斯清除出去，而是让那群异形接管了整座殖民地！数百万人类的生命遭到了腐化的玷污。即便是贸易许可证，也无法为这样的反人类罪行开脱。”

languages.text: 「ただし、{mf|彼|彼女}は惑星から異端を粛清するだけにとどまらなかった。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}ゼノにコロニー全体を支配させたのだ{/d}！何百万人もの人間の生活がゼノの不正行為によって侵害された。人類に対するこのような犯罪は、通商保証書をもってしても正当化することはできないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「ただし、{mf|彼|彼女}は惑星から異端を粛清するだけにとどまらなかった。ゼノにコロニー全体を支配させたのだ！何百万人もの人間の生活がゼノの不正行為によって侵害された。人類に対するこのような犯罪は、通商保証書をもってしても正当化することはできないだろう」

languages.text: "Aber {mf|er|sie} unterließ es nicht nur, den Planeten von den Ketzern zu reinigen – {mf|er|sie} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}überließ den Xenos die Kontrolle über die gesamte Kolonie{/d}! Millionen von Menschenleben wurden von der Xeno-Verderbnis beschmutzt. Nicht einmal der Handelsbrief rechtfertigt dieses Verbrechen gegen die Menschheit."
languages.original_text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Aber {mf|er|sie} unterließ es nicht nur, den Planeten von den Ketzern zu reinigen – {mf|er|sie} überließ den Xenos die Kontrolle über die gesamte Kolonie! Millionen von Menschenleben wurden von der Xeno-Verderbnis beschmutzt. Nicht einmal der Handelsbrief rechtfertigt dieses Verbrechen gegen die Menschheit."

languages.text: «¡Excepto que no le bastó con purgar la herejía del planeta, ¡{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}dejó que los xenos se hicieran con el poder de la colonia entera{/d}! Millones de vidas humanas, manchadas por corrupción xenos. Ni siquiera la Patente de Comercio justifica semejante crimen contra la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «¡Excepto que no le bastó con purgar la herejía del planeta, ¡dejó que los xenos se hicieran con el poder de la colonia entera! Millones de vidas humanas, manchadas por corrupción xenos. Ni siquiera la Patente de Comercio justifica semejante crimen contra la Humanidad».

languages.text: "Kendisi gezegendeki kâfirliği temizlemekle yetinmemiş, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}zenoların tüm koloniyi yönetmesine karar vermiştir{/d}! Milyonlarca insan hayatı, zeno yozlaşması ile kirlenmiştir. İnsanlığa karşı işlenen böylesi bir suçu, Ticari Ruhsatnamesi bile haklı çıkaramaz."
languages.original_text: "Except {mf|he|she} did not stop at purging heresy from the planet: {mf|he|she} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ItsTrue}let the xenos take charge of the entire colony{/d}! Millions of human lives have been tainted by xenocorruption. Not even the Warrant of Trade can justify such a crime against Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegendeki kâfirliği temizlemekle yetinmedi ama, zenoların tüm koloniyi yönetmesine karar verdi! Milyonlarca insan hayatı zeno yozlaşması ile kirletildi. İnsanlığa karşı işlenen böylesi bir suçu Ticaret Ruhsatnamesi bile haklı çıkaramaz."

"Gezegendeki kâfirliği temizlemekle yetinmedi ama, zenoların tüm koloniyi yönetmesine karar verdi! Milyonlarca insan hayatı zeno yozlaşması ile kirletildi. İnsanlığa karşı işlenen böylesi bir suçu Ticaret Ruhsatnamesi bile haklı çıkaramaz."
